item.title: Add Gpg Keys to Repo
item.description: Add GPG keys to github repo and local The process involves a set of simple steps: Create GPG keys from commandline terminal Export the created keys using armor into a text blob. Take the blob and head over to github account -> Settings -> SSH and GPG keys and add it as GPG key The most important point: cd to you local repo directory and configure the key there. This step will need to be done for every local repo.
